ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: Indicates when the documentation of the assessment was complete.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A summary of the context and/or cause of the assessment - why / where it was performed, and what patient events/status prompted it.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: The Encounter during which this ClinicalImpression was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

ivardefs.name: finding_
ivardefs.desc: Specific findings or diagnoses that were considered likely or relevant to ongoing treatment.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Business identifiers assigned to this clinical impression by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Commentary about the impression, typically recorded after the impression itself was made, though supplemental notes by the original author could also appear.

ivardefs.name: previous
ivardefs.desc: A reference to the last assessment that was conducted on this patient. Assessments are often/usually ongoing in nature; a care provider (practitioner or team) will make new assessments on an ongoing basis as new data arises or the patient's conditions cha

ivardefs.name: problem_
ivardefs.desc: A list of the relevant problems/conditions for a patient.

ivardefs.name: protocol_
ivardefs.desc: Reference to a specific published clinical protocol that was followed during this assessment, and/or that provides evidence in support of the diagnosis.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the workflow status of the assessment.

ivardefs.name: statusReason
ivardefs.desc: Captures the reason for the current state of the ClinicalImpression.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient or group of individuals assessed as part of this record.

ivardefs.name: summary
ivardefs.desc: A text summary of the investigations and the diagnosis.

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Information supporting the clinical impression, which can contain investigation results.

properties.desc: A record of a clinical assessment performed to determine what problem(s) may affect the patient and before planning the treatments or management strategies that are best to manage a patient's condition. Assessments are often 1:1 with a clinical consultati
